content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for your interest in my apartment. Based on the location and size of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 1500 Euros per month. This price reflects the value of the property in the current market and will provide me with a reasonable return on my investment. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think it's a bit high, can you consider lowering it?

I am a student, so I have a limited budget. I am dependable and responsible, so I am willing to pay a lower price if it means I can afford it.

I would like to negotiate on the rental price to find a more affordable option.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand your concerns, Hassan. Thank you for your interest in the apartment and for your willingness to negotiate. Based on your budget and your reliability as a tenant, I am willing to consider a lower rental price. Would you be able to provide me with more information about your financial situation and your expected expenses during your stay in New York? This will help me to determine a more suitable rental price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student, so I will be living alone in the apartment. My monthly expenses will include rent, utilities, food, transportation, and other miscellaneous expenses. I estimate that my monthly expenses will be around 1000 Euros.

I am willing to pay a lower rental price if it means I can afford it. I would like to negotiate on the rental price to find a more affordable option. Please let me know if there is anything else I can provide to help with the negotiation.

content: Thank you for providing this information, Hassan. Based on your estimated expenses and your willingness to negotiate, I am willing to consider a lower rental price.
